title: Risk of stack overflow when sending beacon blocks by range
body:
### Description
`BeaconBlocksByRangeMessageHandler` repeatedly chains futures which may have already completed which leads to a risk of a stack overflow exception.

This particular exception was also incorrectly logged at `ERROR` level but should have been `DEBUG` or `TRACE`.


